name: Run-Bike-Hike
description: Run, Bike, Hike... allow you to record your running or biking sessions, so you can follow your sporting progress.

scripts.dev: npm run pre:build && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:cp
scripts.build: npm run pre:build && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:cp && npm run packaging

author: Nicolas Delebecque
